description: A charming nightgown in soft mint green cotton scattered with white daisy prints

core:description.text: A charming nightgown in soft mint green cotton, scattered with small white daisy prints that evoke spring meadows. Flutter sleeves create gentle movement with every step, while the loose-fitting bodice and mid-thigh hem allow for unrestricted comfort during sleep. The breathable fabric keeps the body cool through warm nights, making this an ideal choice for restful slumber.
